QuestData.Title: Oh, the Clawdacity!
QuestData.Description:
The leader of the Cavemoss makrura, Clawdayshus, has been ordering raids into the Cavemoss village to steal the young for snacks.
This isn't going to do at all. In order to prove their power, Murky and the tadpoles must destroy him as well!
This is a job for murlocs.
Mindmeld with Murky in his egg and show him how it's done!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The most audacious makrura by the sea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Mindmeld with Murky and defeat Clawdayshus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Clawdayshus is ruthless. Murky must stop him.
QuestData.RewardText:
You did it! Murky will make a great leader for the next generation of the murlocs here.
I can't help but feel sad over losing my little buddy, but you've got to let them go sometime.
